price_text: Reduced Mid $400K range. Huge house for the price
description:
I live here on Russell Island and look forward to assisting you find your perfect property.

Unable to bear the searching for the house to suit your needs? Bear with me, read on to discover you have found your new home….

- I Proudly market 25 Fenton Road. 559sqm of private, tranquil island living. Surrounded by council land offers you so much more than just a fantastic house.

- No bears in the woods, more like Cinderella comes to mind when you think about this house.

- Completely overhauled looks new, offers you more than just the WOW impressive modern looks, its everything you don’t see. Buy with confidence this ‘Barn Style’ house will make a fantastic island holiday home, a forever home and great investment property.

- Set back on the block the large front windows and door looking out to the front yard allows you to take it all in and enjoy the peace and quiet or watch the kids and animals play the Island living difference at affordable prices. .

- Fully fenced-17.1m frontage/Rear 32.8m depth ,photos shows approximate. Clever landscaped gardens with the feature to make what is normally an unbearable sight in yards, the septic... this septic is hidden.

- Modern kitchen, new benchtop ,stove and retractable rangehood. Over head cupboards and microwave nook. Plenty of space as you can see for the double door fridge.

- 4 spacious bedrooms see photo indicated locations.1-4

- Bathroom is large, the shower has two shower heads one for the kids or animals one for the adults.

- Laundry with linen cupboard and located to walk out to the side of the yard handy next to the clothes line. Both these rooms are between the bedrooms to offer you more privacy.

- Each bedroom has stylish built in mirrored robes, shelves and hanging space

- New wood look floors in bedrooms makes the cleaning a breeze ,tiled living area for the traffic this 4 bedroom house will see.

- Seller has said present the price from $450k and the fridge,dining table, tv and washing machine and dryer will stay.

- Ceiling fans with remote throughout even the front porch area .

- Extremely high ceilings ……..ceiling height. The wow as soon as you walk in the doors will take your breath away. The bear in the photo is 2.3 metres tall. So as you can see large furniture has no issue in this house.

- Front tiled cover entrance to the house allows you to sit and enjoy the breeze and birdlife and also keeps the house cool.

- Tinted front doors adds more privacy. Window awnings helps keep the bedrooms cool while adding the look to this barn style home.

- Extra Height on the carport is fantastic for your boat or caravan.

- Water tank

- New gas hot water service

- Satellite facility there ,currently not used be owner, tv connections in the front bedroom also.

The buyer who wants a great home, location and opportunity will call today to present their contract .

Let’s discuss all your options to own this property. Budget you would have to present your Offers from $460K neg. K will be considered.

Come see why we love this location. North Stradbroke, Peel, Macleay, Karragarra, Lamb islands, Canaipa Passage-national waterways of environmental significance, fishing, boating the lifestyle many are discovering...Gone are the olden day stories. Lifestyle is what we want. Time waits for no one... With recent events worldwide more & more people have made a lifestyle change. Water views or water close by to enjoy their time. You will discover as the many who are coming from everywhere why Russell Island is no longer a secret. New Ferry terminal has started, more businesses are starting whether home based or commercial buildings currently underway. Take a pleasurable 20-minute express ferry to Redlands or the 30 minute all island ferry, free inter island ferry trips which ever you catch sure beats being stuck in pollution & traffic, paying the bridge tolls. Do you hear yourself saying “Why do I do it?”

Great community atmosphere, more than enough right here on the island don’t wait any longer ...

Are you ready to buy now? Cash buyer or pre-approved for Russell Island ? Rates approx $500

Affordable- “Lifestyle awaits you. Isn’t it time you made your move?”

Please register your details whether you are a seller to be or a buyer, I do look forward to booking time to show you what is available. It takes time to find the right property. Time is never spare so please lets use it wisely to match the best to suit your needs. You will find I am the island agent to assist with In-depth local knowledge. Live, love, work local.

Call Karen Dell to book your inspection today if you want honest help to find your island property. Awarded 2022 No.1 Agent Rate My Agent for Russell Island.

Disclaimer: All information contained herein is gathered from sources we consider to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided and interested parties must solely rely on their own enquiries.

Property Code: 748
